svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2024-02-06T15:44:29.235Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/116.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" etag="xida0imT3zvcWvsyCvPo" version="23.1.1" type="google" scale="1" border="0"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="42789a77-a242-8287-6e28-9cd8cfd52e62"> <mxGraphModel dx="1430" dy="766" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1100" pageHeight="850" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-7" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-2" target="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-6"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-2" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;" face="Verdana"><b>Capture physical information<br><br style="border-color: var(--border-color);"></b></font><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); text-align: left;"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); background-color: initial;"><font face="Verdana">- Take picture of front and</font></span><span style="background-color: initial;"><font face="Verdana">&nbsp;back</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial;"><font face="Verdana">You can take additional picture of first page, spine, random page, close-up of book imperfection such as bumped corner, scribble, etc)</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); text-align: left;"><span style="font-family: Verdana; background-color: initial;">- If the ISBN is present as a barcode, it will be register automatically. Otherwise, you can manually type the ISBN</span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); text-align: left;"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); background-color: initial;"><font face="Verdana">- Book state (brand new, very good, good, medium)</font></span></div><div style="border-color: var(--border-color); text-align: left;"><span style="border-color: var(--border-color); background-color: initial;"><font face="Verdana">- Weight (for shipping)</font></span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;spacing=8;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="60" y="150" width="320" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-9" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-6" target="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-6" value="<font style="" face="Verdana"><span style="font-weight: bold; font-size: 14px;">Enrichment<br></span><br><font style="font-size: 12px;">Query all the MDP (Metadata Providers) for additionnal book information:<br><div style="text-align: left;"><ul><li><span style="background-color: initial;">Title</span></li><li><span style="background-color: initial;">Authors<br></span></li><li><span style="background-color: initial;">Blurb<br></span></li><li><span style="background-color: initial;">Keyword<br></span></li><li><span style="background-color: initial;">Market price</span></li></ul></div></font></font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;spacing=8;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="430" y="150" width="230" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-12" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=1;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-8" target="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-11"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-8" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><b style="font-family: Verdana; background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 14px;">Metadata merging, verification and correction</font></b></div><div style="text-align: center;"><b style="font-family: Verdana; background-color: initial;"><font style="font-size: 14px;"><br></font></b></div><font style="font-size: 12px;" face="Verdana">Merge the MD from all the MDP by taking the best value for each field<br>Because the MDP may not contain accurate data, a quick manual verification might be needed<br></font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;align=left;spacing=8;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="700" y="150" width="240" height="260" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-15" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-11" target="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-14"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-11" value="<div style="text-align: center;"><b style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana; background-color: initial;">Pusblishing</b></div><div style="text-align: center;"><b style="font-size: 14px; font-family: Verdana; background-color: initial;"><br></b></div><font face="Verdana">Provide all the information needed to publish the ad<br>Idealy, this step would be automated, but AdPublisher usually block the publication if they suspect the ad is submitted by a bot<br>Display all the field in the same order the AdPublisher will ask them, with Copy shortcut and Drag&amp;Drop for images</font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;rounded=1;spacing=8;verticalAlign=middle;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="440" y="450" width="340" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="nj04EhkR47m6hA_ID_TV-14" value="<font face="Verdana"><font style="font-size: 14px;"><b>Book retreival<br><br><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal;">When a buyer is found, provide a way to quickly retrieve the book</span></div><div style="text-align: left;"><span style="background-color: initial; font-size: 12px; font-weight: normal;"><br></span></div></b></font></font>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;rounded=1;spacing=8;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="140" y="480" width="220" height="180" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 306px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 7px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

span.font: You can take additional picture of first page, spine, random page, close-up of book imperfection such as bumped corner, scribble, etc)

div.span: - If the ISBN is present as a barcode, it will be register automatically. Otherwise, you can manually type the ISBN

span.font: - Book state (brand new, very good, good, medium)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 216px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 377px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.font:
Query all the MDP (Metadata Providers) for additionnal book information:
Title
Authors
Blurb
Keyword
Market price

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 226px; height: 1px; padding-top: 130px; margin-left: 648px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Merge the MD from all the MDP by taking the best value for each field
Because the MDP may not contain accurate data, a quick manual verification might be needed

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 326px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 388px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Provide all the information needed to publish the ad
Idealy, this step would be automated, but AdPublisher usually block the publication if they suspect the ad is submitted by a bot
Display all the field in the same order the AdPublisher will ask them, with Copy shortcut and Drag&Drop for images

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 206px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 87px;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

font.b:
Book retreival
When a buyer is found, provide a way to quickly retrieve the book
